scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.test:all: concurrently "cd client && npm test" "cd server && npm test"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:clean && npm run docker:prune && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
